description: Three 60-card genre-focused expansions for The Story Engine Deck. Each expansion provides balanced composition with genre-specific prompts.

horror.name: Written in Ash & Bone
horror.contentWarning: Contains disturbing cues. We recommend using care, communication, and check-ins when using the deck, especially for collaboration or publication. Horror elements can be powerful and painful triggers for many people.

usage.description: Three 60-card genre expansions providing focused prompts for Fantasy, Horror, and Science Fiction storytelling.
integration: Use only expansion cards - Provides genre-focused prompts, but you will cycle through the same cards more often
Mix expansion cards into the main deck - The main deck works with all genres, so the added cards will increase the genre focus
Freely mix multiple expansions and boosters - Blending genres is a rewarding (and challenging) way to create prompts
recommendations: You may wish to temporarily remove cards from the main deck to increase the proportion of expansion cards and create more genre-focused prompts
